Syntax Highlighting

Syntax highlighting is currently supported for the following languages:

  • Assembler (X86)
  • C
  • C++
  • C#
  • Fortran
  • HTML
  • Java
  • JavaScript
  • Perl
  • Properties files
  • SAS
  • SQL
  • UNIX shell scripts
  • Windows batch
  • XML

The highlighting will take effect on all documents with the proper extensions as defined in the File Filters option panel of the Options dialog. You can modify the colors or fonts used when syntax highlighting via the Syntax Highlighting options panel.
